attributes.action: Theresa May should resign to allow a general election immediately to take place.
attributes.background: In the light of the chaos in government relating to Brexit and the dire need for action on domestic policy the UK needs to have a general election to elect a new and viable government

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a Minister to lose their job.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.

There's already a petition calling for a general election. You might like to sign this one. You're more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
